info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 31 at 3:01AM MDT until April 02 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM MDT this morning. For the High Wind Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: If driving in dense fog, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
